title: More Guitar Inlay Font Adventures
content:
Cleaning up the huge image library I'm amassing and ran across these typographic inlays we've done.

"DIABLO" in P22 Posada:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318003451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_diablo_4067.jpg)

"Alexandria" in a custom calligraphy:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318003451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_alexandria_6217.jpg)

"PT" in Psy-Ops Alembic slightly modified to match the vibe of the other fingerboard inlays:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318003451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_psyops-alembic_6229.jpg)

These are all hand cut with a jeweller's saw by some amazing artisans.
author: mica
